API Reference#

actions.build_xmls.build_xml_text(text)

Build a final string that can be pasted into a .xml file from the strings returned by the build_rule() methods in the Rule classes

actions.rule_collection.Rule_Collection([name])

Collection of :obj:`Rule`s that can be organized and stored together

rules.rule.Rule([list_of_emails, ...])

Defines an individual mail rule and its necessary attributes

rules.copy_to.Copy_To(rule_label[, ...])

Copy_To rule object which is a sub-class of Rule

rules.move_to.Move_To(rule_label[, ...])

Move_To rule object which is a sub-class of Rule
